turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have a black and white mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and was that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you have a milk preference, or is whole milk ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and did u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you make sure that it is light whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania on Old York Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 grande black and white mocha with soy milk, with light whipped cream from the starbucks on old york road in jenkintown pennsylvania will be $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in about 10 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt will be sent to your phone shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'd be great. No. That was it. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care!
